content:
Who are Ellis Audio?

Ellis Audio provide hire high quality Audio/Visual equipment for Parties, Weddings, Live Music and Corporate events.Custom Packages are available, please see our inventory under Equipment for Hire. For all enquiries contact Nick on 0458 708 648.

Need an operator?

While we can provide training for small systems, sometime you need someone more experienced, we are more than happy to help organise an operator.

Pickup and Delivery

All Packages and Prices include Pickup only. Delivery and setup is available with prices starting from $40, surcharges may apply.
